charges.charge_disposition: Custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 9 months. Supervised Release for a term of 2 years. Special Assessment is remitted. Fine is waived.

charges.charge_description: A native and citizen of Mexico, and an alien who had been previously deported from the United States, after having been convicted of a crime defined as an aggravated felony, was found unlawfully in the United States at Houston, Texas, the said defendant having not obtained the consent before March 2003 from the attorney General of the United States to reapply for admission into the United States; and without having obtained corresponding consent after February 2003 from the Secretary of Homeland Security pursuant to 6 USC 202(3) and (4) and 6 USC 557,, 8:1326.F
